version_description: The initial release of SimpleRockets 2 on the iOS App Store.

* Added auto-pilot functionality for airplanes so they can now be controlled by the nav sphere.
* Added planetary rings to Urados.
* Added the ability to group/weld parts together in the designer.
* Added Part Connections panel that allows manu

* Added highly customizable Spotlight and Beacon Light parts.
* Added Quick Mirror, Mirror Selected Part, and a new Mirror Tool to help simplify building aircraft.
* Reorganized the Gizmos part category in the designer
* Performance enhancements

Added Vizzy, an automated visual programming system so now you can program your craft to execute a wide variety of flight oriented tasks. Just click the EDIT PROGRAM button in the menu while building your rocket to get started. Check the blog on SimpleRoc

Added astronauts and a lot more! Check our blog for the full release notes:
https://www.simplerockets.com/Blog

Added astronauts and a lot more! Check our blog for the full release notes:
https://www.simplerockets.com/Blog

We recently added astronauts and a lot more! Check our blog for the full release notes:
https://www.simplerockets.com/Blog

Major updates to the way the game manages planetary systems. This is primarily behind the scenes changes in support of Planet Studio, which is currently under development. The game and website now support the uploading and downloading of celestial bodies

## Bug Fixes
* Fixed a bug where the player could not win the Escape Droo challenge.
* Fixed a bug where multi-directional RCS might not work correctly when resuming a craft in flight.
* Greatly reduced the occurence of a camera seam bug in pl

* Added Flight Director Attitude Indicator (aka Navball)
* Added additional navigation heading locks, such as radial and normal.
* Updated instrument panel to include battery and mono & removed fuel bars from throttle slider.
* Updated gam

Fixed bug which could result in MapView becoming unresponsive after certain crafts activate stages.
Fixed a bug that could cause launch pads and runways to be incorrectly rotated for non-stock planetary systems.

* Five new space capsules
* Jet cockpit with glass canopy.
* Multi-Function Display part
* Label part that adds custom text onto your craft

And so much more. Check out our release notes here:
https://www.simplerockets.com/Blog

And so much m

* Added 20 new celestial bodies:
* Completely redesigned Droo, Cylero, Luna, Tydos, Urados, and Juno
* Added two new planets: Vulco and Sergeaa
* Added eleven new moons
* Added new runways, buildings, and launchpad.
* Added new gauge

v0.9.616 is a small update that includes some bug fixes from the last major update (v0.9.614).
